channel.title: SinScape (Hyperion #474 Development)
channel.description:
[b]For development progress updates, please visit my blog. This is what helps raise money for a dedicated host, by simply viewing:[/b] [url=http://sinscape-rsps.blogspot.co.uk/]http://sinscape-rsps.blogspot.co.uk/[/url]
Hello. I am here to show you the progress of a Hyperion #474 RSPS development project. The source is a derivative of the "Rs2-Serber" release by Scu11 and Vastico, simply called "Rs2-Serber Edit" by winter2000. I am now continuing their work under the name "SinScape".
[center][b][size=14pt]Current Contributions:[/size] [size=18pt]£34.09/???[/size][/center]
[center][IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/4091/sinscapesmalllogo.png[/img][/center]
[b][u]Primary ambitions and ethics:[/u][/b]
[ul][li][b]A new way to fund a dedicated host;[/b] asking for donations is always something I've been against. So, as an alternative, I am going to keep a blog of my development where I plan to set-up a Google Adsense account in the near future. I am also going to make use of another websites referral system, that pays me to refer other people to register with them. I can then use this money to buy a dedicated server for you all to play. Raising the funds this way helps avoid any controversy regarding owners using donations for anything but the server.[/li] [li][b]Strong economy;[/b] shop stock and monster drops will be carefully analysed. Everything will be taken into consideration when implementing items to provide fun game-play and a balanced economy.[/li] [li][b]Equality;[/b] no donator rank or membership regimes. This helps avoid any "I'm better than you" conflicts. Every player (including moderators) are treated the same.[/li] [li][b]Community focused;[/b] a non-profit community that listens to what it's members want, handles disputes in a formal, non-biased manner, has regular events and always finds time to help the needy. No one is left out.[/li] [li][b]Management;[/b] a completely diverse way of managing account security, rule-breakers and general server statistics. Text logs of all kinds, so that there is always some form of evidence for handling problems such as a loss of account or some form of bug abuse.[/li][/ul]
These are just a few initial ideas I have in mind whilst I develop the server and build up an audience/community. [b]Some other features will include:[/b]
[ul][li]A vast amount of obtainable items;[/li] [li]Detailed and diverse skills to train;[/li] [li]Unique dungeons and other areas of the map to explore;[/li] [li]New and exciting monsters to slay;[/li] [li]Game-play that is not too easy, not too hard;[/li] [li]Quality support - you are always an equally valued customer, no matter what;[/li] [li]And always much, much more...[/li][/ul]
The overall plan for the next few months is to build, optimise and test aspects of the game, post regular updates (every day), to build up a big enough audience and hope for a small amount of income to fund a small, dedicated host, to utilize social networking and the works to attract a larger audience, maintain a steady follower base so that it brings a kick start to the community and in-game economy until I am finally ready to open up the game to the public.
So for now, if you are interested in this type of server, why not show your support on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube and the forums by liking and/or following, so you can be informed of any updates.
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/SinnedRSPS][IMG]http://img859.imageshack.us/img859/1995/facebooklogo100182759s.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/SinnedRSPS?feature=mhee][IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/4077/youtubelogon.png[/img][/url] [url=https://twitter.com/#!/SinnedRSPS][IMG]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/4669/38790845.png[/img][/url][/center]
Thanks for reading, and feedback is welcome. All further updates will be posted on my blog, so if you are interested in viewing them I will post a link each time I create a new entry. You can visit the blog here: http://sinscape-rsps.blogspot.co.uk/

item.title: SinScape (Hyperion #474 Development)
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

Sinned:

I was planning to write a blog post today, but I am having problems with fishing (have wrote it from scratch). I’m slightly fatigued, so will come back to it and write up a new blog entry within 24 hours.

Looking forward to that post.

item.title: SinScape (Hyperion #474 Development)
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:38, topic:442500”][quote author=Sinned link=topic=545188.msg4001596#msg4001596 date=1338081712]
They were absolutely necessary for the time being, considering the 474 were corrupt. I do want the GWD map, Security of Stronghold and Lunar island maps added, so the 474 ones will be implemented.
[/quote]

I understand that :P. Implementing those ones shouldn’t be hard.

Yeah, I saw a tutorial on it. I could do that in the future then.

I like the initial idea, to change it to 474 maps would make me sad…

It’s a 474 server… having 317 maps kills it.

That is a valid point, I was thinking of editing that post because i started to agree and this is me agree’ing. ;D

:)[/quote]

I have a feeling that you’re looking forward to playing this also. ;D

Read full topic

item.title: SinScape (Hyperion #474 Development)
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:26, topic:442500”][quote author=Sinned link=topic=545188.msg4000444#msg4000444 date=1337910480]
Do you know the official Rs2 Server from R-S? Well it’s that but with 317 maps (the maps were bugged on the original).
[/quote]

Why no 474 maps?

u make asshole rool sad.[/quote]
Aw, I don’t like making people sad. If I said I can make this server with 317 maps (474 models, textures, items, NPCs and objects) better than what I could make it with 474 corrupt maps (no walls on buildings etc.), would that make you feel better?
[/quote]

Well there have been recreated versions of 474 maps, you could load those.

Read full topic

Read the blog just now, was waiting for so long…Great updates.
[/quote]
We have quite the odd internet arrangement in my household. Basically, I develop offline whilst my wife uses the modem to do her online course. Then I can use it once she’s gone to bed (only one person can use it at a time).

Lol.[/quote]

Oh haha, Atleast you have time to develop.

item.title: SinScape (Hyperion #474 Development)
item.dc:creator: @Sinned Sinned
item.description:
@Sinned wrote:

Development Progress: [color=red]Blog Entry #5 - Thieving and Server Management: http://sinscape-rsps.blogspot.co.uk/

[b]£32.04[b] currently made via Google AdSense!

[quote=“tyb97, post:25, topic:442500”][quote author=Sinned link=topic=545188.msg4000444#msg4000444 date=1337910480]
Do you know the official Rs2 Server from R-S? Well it’s that but with 317 maps (the maps were bugged on the original).
[/quote]
Actually no, I’ll look for it though…[/quote]
Sorry, I should of provided you with the links too:

474 but with corrupt maps (buildings have missing walls): http://google.com/runescape-development/google/downloads/296956-google-474-user-friendly.html
Same client but with 317 maps (the one I’m using): http://google.com/runescape-development/google/downloads/402011-474-google-edit.html

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:26, topic:442500”][quote author=Sinned link=topic=545188.msg4000444#msg4000444 date=1337910480]
Do you know the official Rs2 Server from R-S? Well it’s that but with 317 maps (the maps were bugged on the original).
[/quote]

Why no 474 maps?

u make asshole rool sad.[/quote]
Aw, I don’t like making people sad. If I said I can make this server with 317 maps (474 models, textures, items, NPCs and objects) better than what I could make it with 474 corrupt maps (no walls on buildings etc.), would that make you feel better?

Tutorial:

Good luck, the blog seemed pretty interesting.

Good, thanks for the feedback. I hope it still seems interesting in the future, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: SinScape (Hyperion #474 Development)
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

[quote=“Sinned, post:20, topic:442500”][quote author=Aetoc link=topic=545188.msg4000041#msg4000041 date=1337838543]

From this amazingly formatted post, and also your effort into listing all possible ways this will be better gains my support. Good luck.

Thanks for your kind words. It’s nice to hear people read this, lol.

I love what your doing and will be following this development. I have been clicking the ads at an interval were it is safe to help with the generation of cash.

Slow and steady. Thanks for your comment on the blog too, you’ve been a good source of motivation.

Thanks, Just trying to be useful and support this development.

Edit: Clicked the ad a total of about 20 Times today.
[/quote]

Yeah, holy shit.

£3.36
Today so far

£8.96
Yesterday

£17.54
This month so far.

After £10, you can request a payout. I’m going to keep them with Google until the server is ready. I must (have to) say, keep the clicks legit. This is a much better way than asking for donations from your players, I must say.

Also, working on a new blog entry for tonight.[/quote]

Looking forward too the blog post, I agree it’s better than people thinking you are only running a server for donations.

Read full topic
